channel.title: Whonix Wiki wiki/Kicksecure/Debian Edit Issues

item.title: Whonix Wiki wiki/Kicksecure/Debian Edit Issues
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Thanks for report.

Your account was upgraded just now. You can post links now.

For long (or failing) pastes please use https://paste.debian.net or similar and for image upload some free image upload site such as https://imgur.com (hopefully works over Tor, I didn’t do this in ages and we don’t have this documented yet).

It’s possible there’s some issue. What kind of change you wanted to make? I’ll try to reproduce and fix.

For reference:

Whonix – 19 Apr 20

Install Kicksecure ™ inside Debian

You can install Kicksecure ™ on top of your existing Debian installation.

https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=Kicksecure/Debian&action=edit

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix Wiki wiki/Kicksecure/Debian Edit Issues
item.dc:creator: JOduMonT
item.description:
Hi;

I would like to make some correction on wiki/Kicksecure/Debian
but when I click on edit I only see the header

PS: I can’t be more explicit because I can’t post image and/or add link

Read full topic
